summary:
Testosterone is a vital hormone for boys and men. It helps develop male body parts and makes them stronger and more muscular. It also influences how they act, feel, and think, making them more aggressive and giving them a higher sex drive.

Too little testosterone can cause health problems like weakness and depression. Too much can lead to heart issues and other diseases.

This hormone is made in the testicles and is found in higher amounts in males. It can be used as a medicine for certain conditions but is also misused by some people to improve their bodies and sports performance.
title: Testosterone
